events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer message keywords.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. I’ve attached a picture showing the incorrect item that arrived.
We have reviewed your information and will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you, I appreciate the quick response and help with this refund.
Your refund case is now closed and the refund has been processed successfully.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory.
Since there have been no further responses, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience.
